s** layout definition
.
\documentclass{article}

\setlength{\textwidth}{10cm}
\setlength{\oddsidemargin}{1cm}
\setlength{\marginparwidth}{2.4cm}
\setlength{\marginparsep}{4.5mm}

\begin{document}
\marginpar{And here is a piece on the right.}
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
\end{document}
.
<div class="body">
<p><span class="mpbaseline" id="marginref-1"></span> This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.</p>
</div>
<div class="margin-right">
<div class="marginpar"><div id="1"><span class="mpbaseline"></span>And here is a piece on the right.</div></div>
</div>
.
